## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4a0d5ab634b9ee74c4cf591a4cb1b7f151f6f7116e6cd32bcfd80464d278f1df)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'microviewsharedwidgets' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
